! exec cuetils validate schema.cue a.json
cmp stdout golden.stdout

-- schema.cue --
{
	a: {
		b: int
	}
	c: int
	d: "D"
}
-- a.json --
{
	"a": {
		"b": "B"
	},
	"b": 1,
	"c": 2,
	"d": "D"
}

-- golden.stdout --
a.json
----------------------
a.b: conflicting values "B" and int (mismatched types string and int):
    a.json:3:8
    schema.cue:1:1
    schema.cue:3:6


Errors in 1 file(s)
